about.title: ü©∫ Partner with LinkedMed
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Medical Recruitment Ally
about.description1: At LinkedMed, we understand that staffing your healthcare facility with the right professionals is not just a task --- it's a mission.
about.description2: With over four years of experience connecting clinics, hospitals, and care institutions across Europe and the Middle East with highly qualified doctors, nurses, and pharmacists, we specialize in clinical precision, regulatory compliance, and human reliability.

service.title: Our Comprehensive Service
service.step1: Every healthcare provider we recommend has been thoroughly vetted, language-trained, and prepared to meet your institution's standards.
service.step2: Our team supports you from first contact to final onboarding ‚Äî including document handling, visa logistics, and long-term follow-up.
service.step3: We'll respond within 48 hours with candidates you can trust, and a process you'll respect.

precision.title: Clinical Precision
precision.description: Medically, culturally, and professionally prepared healthcare professionals.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Full support with document handling, visa logistics, and legal requirements.

terms.title: LinkedMed ‚Äî Employer Terms & Conditions of Service
terms.agreement: By submitting a registration or inquiry to LinkedMed, you (the "Employer") agree to the following terms:

scope.title: 1. Scope of Service
scope.content: LinkedMed provides recruitment and facilitation services for the introduction of qualified healthcare professionals ("Candidates") to healthcare institutions and companies ("Employers"). LinkedMed acts solely as an intermediary and does not employ the candidates directly.

liability.title: 2. Candidate Relationship & Liability
liability.point1: All employment agreements are entered into exclusively between the Employer and the Candidate.
liability.point2: LinkedMed is not liable for any acts, omissions, negligence, misconduct, breach of contract, or other actions taken by the Candidate once employed by the Employer.
liability.point3: The Employer agrees to conduct its own due diligence, including professional interviews, reference checks, and contract negotiations before hiring.
liability.point4: LinkedMed does not guarantee job performance, visa approval, or retention beyond the introduction period.

compliance.title: 3. Compliance with Legal Requirements
compliance.point1: The Employer acknowledges that it is solely responsible for ensuring legal compliance with all applicable labor, immigration, licensing, and tax laws in its jurisdiction.
compliance.point2: LinkedMed provides supporting documentation and administrative assistance only, not legal or immigration representation.

dataProtection.title: 4. Data Protection (GDPR & International Standards)
dataProtection.point1: All personal data shared by LinkedMed or the Candidate must be processed in accordance with GDPR and applicable data protection regulations.
dataProtection.point2: Employers must treat all candidate data as confidential and shall not disclose it to third parties without express written consent.

indemnification.title: 5. Indemnification
indemnification.content: The Employer agrees to indemnify and hold harmless LinkedMed, its directors, staff, and partners from any claim, liability, loss, or damage arising from:
indemnification.point1: The use or misuse of LinkedMed's services
indemnification.point2: The employment or engagement of a Candidate introduced by LinkedMed
indemnification.point3: Any claims brought by the Candidate related to employment conditions, visa status, or legal disputes

noGuarantee.title: 6. No Guarantee Clause
noGuarantee.content: While LinkedMed ensures that candidates meet general eligibility requirements and language qualifications, the Employer accepts that outcome-based results (such as visa issuance, contract duration, or relocation success) cannot be guaranteed. Any delays or failures due to government, embassy, or licensing authorities are outside LinkedMed's control.

termination.title: 7. Termination of Engagement
termination.content: LinkedMed reserves the right to terminate service with any employer who:
termination.point1: Misuses candidate data or violates privacy laws
termination.point2: Discriminates or engages in unethical hiring practices
termination.point3: Misrepresents working conditions or contractual obligations

jurisdiction.title: 8. Jurisdiction & Governing Law
jurisdiction.content: These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany. Disputes arising from this agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

modification.title: 9. Modification Clause
modification.content: LinkedMed may update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated version.

Issue key: Issue essential documents (certificates of good standing, professional association certificates, etc.)
personal checklist and real-4me tracking: Personal checklist and real-time tracking system so you never miss a step via your LinkedMed portal
LinkedMed handled: LinkedMed handled every document with precision‚ÄîI focused only on my future.
Language proficiency: Language proficiency is not just a requirement‚Äîit's the foundation of your success. With our e-learning platform, you'll build strong communication skills at your own pace. *What we do:*

Lifelong: Lifelong support for new job opportunities, license renewals, and education.

hero.title: Transform Your Healthcare Career Globally
hero.subtitle: Connect with premium healthcare opportunities worldwide through our comprehensive placement and support program

messageBox.title: The Truth About Healthcare Career Transformation
messageBox.paragraph1: We understood that finding the right healthcare opportunity abroad isn't just about matching skills‚Äîit's about navigating complex systems, language barriers, and cultural differences.
messageBox.paragraph2: LinkedMed was born from recognizing that healthcare professionals needed more than job placement‚Äîthey needed comprehensive career transformation support.
messageBox.paragraph3: Our vision: to bridge the gap between talented healthcare professionals and global opportunities through personalized guidance and unwavering support.

expansion.title: From One Dream to Many
expansion.paragraph1: What started as one person's dream of working abroad has evolved into a movement connecting thousands of healthcare professionals worldwide.
expansion.paragraph2: We've expanded from helping individual nurses find opportunities to building comprehensive pathways for doctors, specialists, and healthcare support staff across multiple countries.
expansion.paragraph3: From our headquarters in Cairo, we now serve healthcare professionals across the Middle East, Europe, and beyond, creating bridges between talent and opportunity.

process.title: More Than a Process
process.subtitle: We don't just process applications‚Äîwe transform careers through comprehensive support that addresses every aspect of your international healthcare journey.
process.description: From language mastery to cultural integration, from exam preparation to ongoing career support, we're with you every step of the way.

languageMastery.title: Language Mastery
languageMastery.desc: Comprehensive language training tailored to healthcare terminology and cultural communication

examExcellence.title: Exam Excellence
examExcellence.desc: Targeted preparation for licensing exams with expert guidance and proven strategies

documentPerfection.title: Document Perfection
documentPerfection.desc: Complete credential evaluation and documentation support for seamless applications

perfectMatching.title: Perfect Matching
perfectMatching.desc: Personalized job matching based on your skills, preferences, and career goals

ongoingSupport.title: Ongoing Support
ongoingSupport.desc: Continuous guidance from application to integration and beyond

bottomMessage.line1: We don't just handle logistics and paperwork.

aya.name: Aya's Journey
aya.title: Nurse ‚Ä¢ Germany
aya.quote: I was overwhelmed by the process of working abroad. LinkedMed didn't just find me a position‚Äîthey prepared me for success. From language training to cultural orientation, they thought of everything. Now I'm thriving in my dream role in Germany.

mahmoud.name: Mahmoud's Success
mahmoud.title: Doctor ‚Ä¢ UAE
mahmoud.quote: The licensing exam seemed impossible until LinkedMed's targeted preparation program. Their expert guidance and personalized study plan made all the difference. I passed on my first attempt and now practice medicine in the UAE with confidence.

bottomMessage.line1: We don't just create job placements.
bottomMessage.line2: We create new beginnings and transform lives.

whoWeAre.title: This Is Who We Are

notJust.line1: We are not just recruitment agents processing applications.
notJust.line2: We are not just a service provider checking boxes.

whoWeAre.weAre: We are believers in human potential.

beliefs.line1: We believe in the potential of every healthcare professional to make a difference beyond borders.
beliefs.line2: We see the person behind the CV, the dreams behind the qualifications, the impact you can make in a new country.
beliefs.line3: When you succeed, patients receive better care. When you thrive, healthcare systems improve. When you grow, we all benefit.
beliefs.line4: We don't just connect you with opportunities‚Äîwe connect you with your future.

future.line1: The future of healthcare is global, and you're part of that future.
future.line2: Something bigger than yourself is calling.
future.line3: Are you ready to answer that call?
future.line4: We'll be right there to walk beside you, every step of the way.

about.title: What is our referral program?
about.description1: Our referral program is designed to help healthcare professionals connect with opportunities while rewarding those who help us build our community.
about.description2: When you refer a qualified healthcare professional who successfully joins our network, both you and your referral benefit from our program.

howItWorks.title: How it works:
howItWorks.step1: Fill out the referral form with your details and your friend's information.
howItWorks.step2: We'll contact your referred friend with relevant opportunities.
howItWorks.step3: When they successfully join our network, you both receive rewards

referrer.title: For You (Referrer)
referrer.description: Earn rewards for each successful referral and help expand our professional network.

friend.title: For Your Friend
friend.description: Access to exclusive healthcare opportunities and career advancement support.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content:
üìã **Terms & Conditions**

1. **Referrals must be submitted** via our official [Referral Rewards Registration Form] to be eligible for the program.

2. **There is no limit** to how many individuals you may refer. However, each referred candidate can only be referred once.

3. **You do not need to be a LinkedMed candidate** to refer someone, but you must provide accurate contact details for both yourself and the referred individual.

4. The referred individual must:
   ‚Ä¢ Be aware they are being referred.
   ‚Ä¢ Have consented to being contacted by LinkedMed.
   ‚Ä¢ Not already exist in the LinkedMed candidate database.

5. For a referral to qualify for a reward, the following conditions must be met:
   ‚Ä¢ The referred candidate must complete the LinkedMed registration process.
   ‚Ä¢ They must successfully obtain a contract through LinkedMed within **12 months** of referral.
   ‚Ä¢ They must begin employment and complete the minimum required probationary period (details vary by contract and will be confirmed by LinkedMed).

6. Referred candidates must meet LinkedMed's qualification, licensing, and placement criteria to be eligible.

7. Cash rewards will only be issued **after the referred candidate has started employment and met all outlined conditions**.

8. **Reward amounts may vary** based on the country of employment and role. These details will be communicated during the referral process.

9. LinkedMed reserves the right to validate all claims and to decline or withhold rewards in case of fraudulent, duplicate, or invalid submissions.

10. LinkedMed may revise, suspend, or terminate this referral program at any time without prior notice.

11. By participating in this program, you acknowledge and accept these terms in full.

ceotext: From the first meeting to the final delivery, Ethan Vina instilled confidence and provided everything we asked for. The quality of his work speaks for itself‚Äîhe can execute quickly. He is an excellent Webflow developer, and we will work with him again very soon.

about.title: About Us
about.aboutText: With over two decades of excellence in healthcare recruitment and workforce solu6ons, LinkedMed was founded in 2022, establishing its inaugural office in Dubai‚Äîan epicenter of medical innova6on and global connec6vity. Expanding our footprint, we launched in Frankfurt, a cornerstone of European healthcare, and are now poised to extend our exper6se to Cairo, further solidifying our presence in key medical hubs. As a premier healthcare talent acquisi6on firm, LinkedMed specializes in sourcing, creden6aling, and placing elite medical professionals across 10+ countries. We collaborate with world-class healthcare ins6tu6ons, ensuring seamless integra6on of top-6er doctors, physicians, surgeons, nurses, pharmacists, and allied healthcare specialists into high-caliber medical environments. Our mission is to elevate healthcare standards by aligning excep6onal clinical talent with pres6gious medical ins6tu6ons worldwide. Through strategic workforce solu6ons, we bridge the gap between exper6se and opportunity, op6mizing pa6ent care outcomes and advancing the future of global medicine.

about.Training to enhance communication skills: Training to enhance communication skills for candidates
about.Candidates initiate their journey by sub: Candidates initiate their journey by submitting applications through our online platform. They can upload credentials and details easily
about.Submitted applications go through a revi: Submitted applications go through a review process considering qualifications, experience, and language proficiency
about.Candidates who pass the review are invit: Candidates who pass the review are invited for interviews. We coordinate schedules to ensure an efficient experience
about.Successful candidates receive formal off: Successful candidates receive formal offers with job details. We ensure clarity and alignment with their career path
about.Accepted candidates enter the onboarding: Accepted candidates enter the onboarding phase with orientation and training for a smooth transition into the German healthcare system
about.Candidates initiate their journey by sub: Candidates initiate their journey by submitting applications through www.linkedinmed.org, ensuring that all required information is captured effectively. Our online platform simplifies the application process, allowing candidates to upload their credentials and details conveniently
about.Once candidates accept offers, they ente: Once candidates accept offers, they enter the onboarding phase, which includes orientation sessions and training to equip them for their new roles. We support your transition into the German healthcare system, providing guidance on regulations, procedures, and cultural nuances
about.Submitted applications undergo a thoroug: Submitted applications undergo a thorough review process. Qualified personnel evaluate candidates based on predefined criteria, ensuring only the best move forward. Our team carefully considers your experience, qualifications, and language proficiency to find the perfect match
about.Candidates who pass the review are invit: Candidates who pass the review are invited for interviews. Coordination between candidates and interviewers is handled seamlessly to align schedules. We streamline the interview process, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for both candidates and employers
about.Successful candidates receive formal off: Successful candidates receive formal offers, which detail job roles and responsibilities, ensuring clarity and transparency. Our team works closely with employers to ensure that the offers meet your expectations and reflect your desired career path
about.Candidates submit: Candidates initiate their journey by submitting applications through the platform, ensuring all required information is captured effectively.
about.Applications: Submitted applications undergo a thorough review by qualified personnel to ensure only the best candidates move forward.
about.Candidate: Candidates who passed the review are invited for interviews. Schedules are coordinated smoothly to ensure alignment.
about.Successful: Successful candidates receive formal offers that clearly outline roles and responsibilities.
about.Candidates: Once candidates accept offers, they enter the onboarding phase, which includes orientation sessions and training.

HomePage.At LinkedMed: At LinkedMed, we don‚Äôt just help you find a job‚Äîwe empower you to build a new life and career in one of the world‚Äôs most respected healthcare systems. With comprehensive support that includes document preparation, German language training, visa coordination, job placement, and post-arrival onboarding, we walk beside you at every stage of your journey. Backed by experience with over 400 trusted partners, our team understands your challenges and works tirelessly to turn them into real opportunities. When you join LinkedMed, you‚Äôre not just a client‚Äîyou become part of a global family committed to professionalism, integrity, and success.
HomePage.LinkedMed is: LinkedMed is the trusted partner of hospitals, clinics, and healthcare institutions across Germany and beyond. We specialize in identifying, preparing, and delivering top-tier medical talent from around the world‚Äîprofessionals who are not only clinically qualified but also linguistically trained and culturally ready to integrate into your teams. Our end-to-end approach, from rigorous document verification to personalized recruitment strategies, saves time, reduces risk, and ensures quality. With LinkedMed, you gain more than candidates‚Äîyou gain a long-term recruitment partner dedicated to your operational excellence and workforce stability.
HomePage.about_p1: With over two decades of excellence in healthcare recruitment and workforce solutions, LinkedMed was founded in 2022, establishing its inaugural office in Dubai‚Äîan epicenter of medical innovation and global connectivity Expanding our footprint, we launched in Frankfurt, a cornerstone of European healthcare, and are now poised to extend our expertise to Cairo, further solidifying our presence in key medical hubs
HomePage.about_p2: As a premier healthcare talent acquisition firm, LinkedMed specializes in sourcing, credentialing, and placing elite medical professionals across 10+ countries We collaborate with world-class healthcare institutions, ensuring seamless integration of top-tier doctors, physicians, surgeons, nurses, pharmacists, and allied healthcare specialists into high-caliber medical environments
HomePage.about_p3: Our mission is to elevate healthcare standards by aligning exceptional clinical talent with prestigious medical institutions worldwide Through strategic workforce solutions, we bridge the gap between expertise and opportunity, optimizing patient care outcomes and advancing the future of global medicine

footer.hagar_testimonial: The support and resources provided by LinkedMed helped me secure my position as a pharmacist (Approbierte). To do so, the platform/company sharpened both my medical knowledge and my language skills to prepare me well for this position.
footer.rebica_testimonial: LinkedMed provides well-prepared, qualified healthcare professionals. Their recruitment process ensures seamless integration into our hospital. A trusted partner for hiring skilled international medical staff!
footer.ahmed_testimonial: LinkedMed helped me achieve my dream of working in Germany! From language training to document verification, their support was incredible. Now, I'm happily working in a top Berlin hospital!
footer.sara_testimonial: Navigating the visa process was overwhelming, but LinkedMed handled everything professionally. Their expertise ensured a smooth journey, and today, I'm a licensed pharmacist in Germany. Highly recommended!
footer.fatima_testimonial: LinkedMed's German courses and exam preparation made learning easy. Their guidance gave me confidence to pass my exams and secure a nursing job in Germany. Truly life-changing!
footer.salma_testimonial: Thanks to LinkedMed, I gained great insight into the crucial role of a pharmacist during my internship (Praktikum) at easy Apotheke for 2 weeks. It enriched my skill set and experience.
footer.missionStatement: Our mission is to provide exceptional services

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.attention: ATTENTION: PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS WEBSITE BY ACCESSING AND USING THIS WEBSITE, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE TERMS, PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS WEBSITE

definitions.we: "we" refers to LinkedMed, a medical recruitment company operating in Germany, Dubai, and Egypt
definitions.you: "you" refers to the individual, firm, company, or organization accessing or using the LinkedMed website and services

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: While we strive to maintain the highest standards and continuous availability of our website and services, the internet is subject to occasional interruptions and downtime We do not accept liability for any service interruptions, errors, delays, or loss of access to our website and services

informationAccuracy.title: Information Accuracy
informationAccuracy.description: We endeavor to provide accurate and up-to-date information; however, some details may be provided by third parties, and we cannot guarantee complete accuracy We do not accept liability for any inaccuracies or omissions

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our website may contain links to third-party websites We do not have control over these websites and do not accept responsibility for their content, security, or data protection policies

linking.title: Linking to LinkedMed's Website
conditions: You do not misrepresent your relationship with LinkedMed
You do not present false information about our services
You do not use LinkedMed's logo without prior consent
Your website does not contain offensive or unlawful content
You obtain permission before linking beyond our homepage

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use of the Website
acceptableUse.purpose: You may only use our website for lawful purposes related to job seeking or staff recruitment
prohibitions: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the website
Disrupt, damage, or impair website functionality
Post or submit false, misleading, or unlawful information
Upload viruses, malware, or harmful software

candidateResponsibilities.title: Candidate Responsibilities
candidateResponsibilities.description: Candidates using our services must ensure that all information provided is accurate, complete, and truthful LinkedMed does not accept responsibility for incorrect, misleading, or fraudulent information provided by candidates If a candidate provides false information, they bear full legal responsibility for any resulting consequences, including loss of employment opportunities or legal action

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtection.description: LinkedMed is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in Germany, the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG), UAE data protection laws, and Egyptian data regulations We process your data for recruitment purposes and comply with legal requirements For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy

userSubmissions.title: Information Submitted by Users
conditions: Consent to us processing and sharing your information for recruitment purposes
Confirm that all provided information is accurate and lawful
Understand that third-party recruitment agencies working with LinkedMed must adhere to our terms and conditions

termsOfBusiness.title: Terms of Business
termsOfBusiness.description: Each employment assignment or placement facilitated by LinkedMed is subject to our standard Terms of Business, which will be provided to employers and candidates upon engagement

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by or licensed to LinkedMed You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce any material from this website without prior written permission

securityAndAccount.title: Security and Account Management
securityAndAccount.description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials If you suspect unauthorized access to your account, you must notify us immediately We are not liable for any unauthorized use of your account

terminationOfAccess.title: Termination of Access
terminationOfAccess.description: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to our website and services at any time, at our sole discretion, without prior notice

limitationOfLiability.description: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to our website and services at any time, at our sole discretion, without prior notice
limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
exemptions: Any loss of business, revenue, or profits resulting from website use
Any errors, delays, or interruptions in service
Any claims arising from the misuse of candidate or employer-provided information

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.description: The use of our website and any agreements made through it shall be governed by the respective legal frameworks of Germany, the United Arab Emirates (Dubai), depending on the jurisdiction of service

updates.title: Updates to Terms & Conditions
updates.description: We may update these terms periodically Continued use of our website signifies acceptance of any updated terms

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.exerciseMethodNote: To exercise these rights, contact us

privacyPromise.commitment: LinkedMed is committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data with transparency and security
privacyPromise.purpose: We collect, process, and store your data solely for the purpose of providing recruitment services
complianceRegulations: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in Germany and the European Union
Bundesdatenschutzgesetz (BDSG - Federal Data Protection Act of Germany)

sensitiveInformation: Health screening data (eg, immunization records, TB/HIV status)
dataCollection.sharingPrinciples: These data are shared only with trusted third parties, including potential employers, medical councils, visa authorities, and database management service providers

purposes.name: Job Matching
purposes.details: We use your name, email, phone number, specialty, and preferred location to match you with suitable job opportunities

purposes.name: Presentation to Employers
purposes.details: Your CV, covering letter, and references (with consent) are shared with potential employers Upon securing a job offer, additional relevant documents you provide will be shared with the employer for verification and onboarding purposes

purposes.name: Medical Registration and Visa Processing
purposes.details: We use your credentials, certifications, and references to facilitate your medical registration and visa applications

purposes.name: Legal Compliance and Fraud Prevention
purposes.details: We may use your data to comply with legal obligations, respond to regulatory inquiries, and detect fraud or security threats

candidateResponsibilities.statement: Candidates are solely responsible for the accuracy and authenticity of the personal and professional information they provide to LinkedMed
candidateResponsibilities.consequences: Any false, misleading, or incorrect information supplied by a candidate may result in the rejection of their application, termination of job placements, or legal action where applicable LinkedMed assumes no liability for consequences arising from incorrect or fraudulent information submitted by candidates

rights.method: You can unsubscribe from emails at any time by contacting data@linkedmedorg with the subject 'Unsubscribe'
If any of your information is incorrect, you can request updates by emailing data@linkedmedorg

If you wish to be removed from our database, email data@linkedmedorg with the subject 'Remove' Please note that once deleted, your data cannot be recovered Some legal obligations may require us to retain your data for a specified period

dataController.details: LinkedMed, registered in Germany, acts as the Data Controller, ensuring compliance with the GDPR, BDSG, and other relevant data protection laws
dataController.legalBasis: We process your data under the legitimate basis of providing international medical recruitment services

sharedWith: Trusted partners providing database, cybersecurity, and IT security services
Legal and regulatory bodies where required by law
Law enforcement agencies if legally mandated
dataSharing.internationalTransfers: Data transfers outside the European Economic Area (EEA) occur only under secure and compliant frameworks, such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission

dataSecurity.approach: LinkedMed implements high-level encryption, secure data storage, and stringent access controls to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse
dataSecurity.thirdPartyRequirements: We require all third parties handling data on our behalf to adhere to strict security protocols, including:
securityMeasures: Regular security audits and penetration testing

cookies.purpose: To improve our services and enhance user experience, we use cookies and tracking technologies
types: Essential Cookies: Required for website functionality
Analytical Cookies: To track usage and optimize services
Marketing Cookies: To provide personalized job recommendations
cookies.management: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings

rights: Access your data: Request a copy of your personal data held by LinkedMed
Request corrections: Amend incorrect or outdated data
Restrict processing: Limit how your data is used under certain conditions
Withdraw consent: Stop data processing when consent is the legal basis
Request data portability: Obtain your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Lodge complaints: If you believe your data is mishandled, you may contact the German Data Protection Authority (Bundesbeauftragter f√ºr den Datenschutz und die Informationsfreiheit - BfDI)
userRights.exerciseMethod: To exercise any of these rights, please email data@linkedmedorg

policyUpdates.details: This policy may be updated periodically The latest version will always be available on our website
policyUpdates.acceptance: Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any updates

makeMove.title: Making the Move with LinkedMed
makeMove.description: Exclusive Information Sessions for Healthcare Professionals Seeking Global Opportunities
makeMove.introduction: At LinkedMed, we understand that relocating for a medical career is a significant step That's why we host "Making the Move" events in key locations, offering doctors, pharmacists, and nurses valuable insights into working abroad‚Äîespecially in Germany and other high-demand regions
makeMove.event_description: These events provide an opportunity to meet our expert team, gain first-hand knowledge about career pathways, licensing, and life abroad, and get answers to all your questions about securing your next role

what_youll_learn.description: Understand the credentialing process and requirements for working in your destination country
Learn about healthcare systems, working hours, and professional expectations
Get expert advice on taxation, salaries, and contracts
Navigate the legal requirements and logistical steps for a smooth transition
Discover what to expect when settling into a new country, including housing, education, and cultural adaptation

who_should_attend: Healthcare professionals exploring international career options
Those actively planning their move and seeking step-by-step guidance
Candidates who have already secured a job and want final preparations

why_attend.description: Learn from recruitment specialists and industry professionals
Connect with peers and professionals who have successfully made the transition
Gain access to exclusive guides, checklists, and professional support

makeMove.call_to_action: Take the first step toward your international medical career with LinkedMed Book your spot at an upcoming "Making the Move" event and get closer to your dream job abroad
makeMove.closing_statement: We look forward to helping you make the move with confidence!

ourValues.mission_statement: At LinkedMed, we pursue a clear mission: creating connections between medical professionals and global career opportunities Our values define who we are and guide every decision we make as we network talents with healthcare systems worldwide

excellence_innovation.title: Excellence & Innovation
excellence_innovation.description: We stand for the highest standards in medical recruiting With cutting-edge technology and industry expertise, we ensure efficient, transparent, and seamless processes that help medical professionals achieve their international career goals

integrity_trust.title: Integrity & Trust
integrity_trust.description: Trust is the foundation of our work We act with complete transparency, ethical responsibility, and fairness, so that both applicants and employers can rely on us

empowerment_growth.title: Empowerment & Growth
empowerment_growth.description: We help medical professionals unfold their full potential ‚Äì with individual support, language courses, and career counseling Our goal is to equip people and institutions with the knowledge and resources they need for their success

global_reach.title: Global Reach, Personal Connection
global_reach.description: With a presence in over 80 countries, we combine international reach with a personal approach Every connection is based on respect, intercultural understanding, and the shared goal of improving global healthcare

impact_driven.title: Sustainable Impact
impact_driven.description: Healthcare professions are more than just a job ‚Äì they are a calling We are proud to support stronger, sustainable healthcare systems through our work by connecting top-tier talents with the institutions that need them most

ourValues.mission_closing: At LinkedMed, we don't just create career opportunities ‚Äì we build future perspectives, strengthen communities, and shape the future of global healthcare

corporate_responsibility.title: Corporate Responsibility in Medical Innovation
corporate_responsibility.subtitle: Annual Commitment to Advancing Cancer Research
corporate_responsibility.description: At LinkedMed, our mission goes beyond personnel placement ‚Äì we are committed to advancing global healthcare As part of our corporate responsibility, we pledge to support groundbreaking cancer research initiatives annually, contributing to medical progress that saves lives By investing in innovation and scientific discoveries, we stand together with medical professionals in the fight against one of the world's greatest health challenges, reaffirming our commitment to a healthier future for all

Testimonials.name: Hagar Elnahhas
Testimonials.testimonial: The support and resources provided by LinkedMed helped me secure my position as a pharmacist (Approbierte). To do so, the platform/company sharpened both my medical knowledge and my language skills to prepare me well for this position.

Testimonials.name: Rebica M√ºller
Testimonials.testimonial: LinkedMed provides well-prepared, qualified healthcare professionals. Their recruitment process ensures seamless integration into our hospital. A trusted partner for hiring skilled international medical staff!

Testimonials.name: Ahmed Sabri
Testimonials.testimonial: LinkedMed helped me achieve training for document verification; their support was my dream of working in Germany! The language courses were incredible. Now, I'm happily working in a top Berlin hospital!

Testimonials.name: Sara Dabagh
Testimonials.testimonial: Navigating the visa process was overwhelming, but LinkedMed handled everything professionally. Their expertise ensured a smooth journey, and today, I'm a licensed pharmacist in Germany. Highly recommended!

Testimonials.name: Fatima M
Testimonials.testimonial: LinkedMed's German courses and exam preparation made learning easy. Their guidance gave me confidence to pass my exams and secure a nursing job in Germany. Truly life-changing!

Testimonials.name: Salma Hany
Testimonials.testimonial: Thanks to LinkedMed, I gained great insight on the crucial role of a pharmacist during my internship (Praktikum) in easy Apotheke for 2 weeks. It enriched my skill set and experience.

title: e-learning
instructions: Simply enter your details and your friend‚Äôs details in the form, return it to
termsText: I have read and accept the
consentNote: Please ensure the above named person has agreed to you sharing their details with Head Medical for the purpose of contacting them regarding recruitment.
termsHeader: Head Medical Referral Rewards Scheme ‚Äì Terms & Conditions
rule1: 1. All referrals should be made by completing our Referral Rewards Registration form.
rule2: 2. Prospective candidates can only be referred once.
rule3: 3. You must be registered with Head Medical to refer a candidate.
rule4: 4. The candidate must not have been referred previously.
rule5: 5. The candidate must not have already had an interview via Head Medical.
rule6: 6. Rewards are paid after the candidate starts their assignment or permanent role.
rule7: 7. Head Medical reserves the right to change or cancel the scheme at any time.
taxNote: Participation may be subject to taxes; individuals should seek their own advice.

Home.journey: Every great journey begins with a single, brave step‚Äîand at LinkedMed, we walk that step with you.
Home.connect: We don‚Äôt just connect healthcare professionals to jobs‚Äîwe help you build a life of purpose abroad. Over the past four years, we‚Äôve guided hundreds toward careers in Germany, turning ambition into reality through secure contracts and visa success.
Home.roots: From our roots in Dubai to Germany, and now Cairo, we‚Äôre closer than ever to the heart of the Arab medical community‚Äîready to support you with smart learning tools, hands-on guidance, and trusted global partners.

hero.title: Our Story: A Journey Beyond Borders
hero.subtitle: It started with a simple truth‚Äî
hero.truth: Talent is everywhere. But opportunity is not.
hero.description: In hospitals across the Arab world, we met doctors filled with potential, nurses brimming with compassion, and pharmacists ready to serve. But between them and their dreams stood language barriers, complex visa systems, endless paperwork, and, above all, uncertainty.
hero.birth: That's when LinkedMed was born. Not just as a company, but as a mission. A promise.
hero.vision: Founded in Dubai, LinkedMed began as a vision: to empower healthcare professionals with the tools, support, and guidance to build a better life beyond borders. We didn't just want to recruit‚Äîwe wanted to uplift. To transform careers. To change lives.

journey.title: From One Dream to Many
journey.start: From that vision, our journey took off.
journey.expansion: We built our foundation in Dubai, but quickly expanded to Germany‚Äîwhere our candidates now work in over 400 trusted hospitals and clinics. From Berlin to Munich, LinkedMed professionals are thriving, respected, and building lives they once only dreamed of.
journey.cairo: And now, we're proud to open our third branch‚Äîin Cairo. Why? Because this mission is personal. Because Egypt, and the Arab world, is full of brilliance waiting to be seen. Because the next doctor, the next nurse, the next leader is out there‚Äîand we're here to help them rise.

process.title: More Than a Process‚ÄîIt's a Journey
process.description: We know your journey is more than a checklist. It's a decision to believe in yourself. To choose growth. And to face uncertainty with courage.
process.support: That's why LinkedMed supports you at every step:

steps.language: We teach you the German language‚Äînot just conversational, but with depth.
steps.exam: We train you to pass the specialized scientific language exam, required to practice in Germany's healthcare system‚Äîthrough our advanced e-learning platform, accessible anytime, anywhere.
steps.documents: We prepare your documents, verify them, and guide you through every embassy step.
steps.matching: We match you with the right employer, where your skills are needed and your future can grow.
steps.support: We support you on the ground, from your arrival to your first day, and beyond.

stories.title: Real People. Real Stories.
stories.aya: Like Dr. Aya from Syria‚Äîwho was ready to give up until LinkedMed stepped in. Today, she's a pediatrician in Cologne, mentoring new arrivals.
stories.mahmoud: Or Mahmoud, a nurse from Giza, who studied late nights on our platform, passed the Fachsprachpr√ºfung, and now sends photos in scrubs with the caption: "I made it."

identity.title: This Is Who We Are
identity.connect: At LinkedMed, we don't just connect you to a job.
identity.future: We connect you to a future.
identity.bigger: One that's bigger, brighter, and finally within reach.
identity.ready: So if you're ready to rise‚Äî
identity.walkBeside: We're ready to walk beside you.

cta.welcome: üåç Welcome to LinkedMed. Your journey starts here.

whyLinkedMed.title: Why LinkedMed?
whyLinkedMed.description1: LinkedMed helps you build a new life and medical career in Germany. We offer full support: document prep, German courses, visa help, job placement, and onboarding. With over 400 partners, we turn challenges into real opportunities. You become part of a trusted, global family. LinkedMed delivers top-tier, language- and culture-ready medical staff. We handle verification, strategy, and recruitment‚Äîsaving time and reducing risk. We‚Äôre not just providers‚Äîwe're your long-term hiring partners.
